locations: ca, canada, quebec, racine, j0e 1y0, route 222, 842, 45.4941146, -72.2628447
short_description: camping plage mckenzie is a rv park/campground based in racine, quebec, canada.
long_description: le camping plage mckenzie a mérité les grands honneurs en recevant le titre de camping de l'année–leclerc assurances 2019 de camping québec, l'association des terrains de camping du québec. il s'agit du prix le plus prestigieux de l'industrie du camping, qui récompense le travail exceptionnel d'un terrain de camping s'étant démarqué par la qualité de ses initiatives à l'égard du service à la clientèle, de la gestion de ses ressources humaines, et par l'excellence de ses pratiques dans l'ensemble de ses opérations. situé sur les rives du lac brompton dans les cantons-de-l'est, le camping plage mckenzie possède 276 sites dont 68 destinés aux campeurs voyageurs. propriété de la famille desautels depuis plus de 40 ans, le camping offre une multitude d'activités et des infrastructures de loisirs de qualité pour le plaisir de toute la famille. venez profiter de l'une des plus belles plages en estrie et de la vue magnifique sur les montagnes. endroit idéal pour profiter de vos sports aquatiques préférés ou pour un bain de soleil bien mérité, le camping plage mckenzie vous charmera avec son ambiance familiale inoubliable.
business_tags: beach camping | campsite map | the community room | clothes washers and dryers | tournament fishing | camping equipment | baby changing stations | comfort stations | bocce ball courts | watercraft rentals | propane gas | national festivals | camp grounds | north home | rainbow trout | appliances electrical | night guard | pickleball court | lumber sales | life jackets | ice vending | gas tanks | aquatic sports | gym facilities | water sports | family camping | groups and courses | pump tracks | electric kick scooter | camp families | homemade pizza | wireless internet | maintenance & operation | site analysis | user experience | human resources | water well | non-potable water | chemicals | waste and water | environmental compliance | biodegradable products
generated_description: camping plage mckenzie is a family-owned campground located in racine, quebec. established in the 1950s, the site was originally a beach for swimming. over the years, it evolved into a campground with 276 sites, including 68 for travelers, offering a variety of amenities and activities for the whole family. the campground features a beach with a scenic view of the lake and mountains, a community center with various indoor activities, a multi-sport field, and outdoor activities such as volleyball, pickleball, and paddleboarding. it also provides rental options for rvs and boats, as well as a range of services including a snack bar, convenience store, and laundry facilities. the campground has received the prestigious camping de l'année award from camping québec in 2019.
